sentence.Network_en: Io tried to talk to Argus, but she didn't know how to.

sentence.Network_en: But Hera wanted to punish her for Argus'death.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是希拉想要为阿格斯的死处罚爱娥.

sentence.Network_en: Then Argus appeared and saw them. He didn't understand what was happening.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时阿格斯突然出现,瞧见了他们. 他不知道发生了何事.
